explanation: [0-0] A man sits on a green chair in front of a white table, with a white pacifier in his mouth. He has short black hair and is wearing a gray patterned short-sleeve shirt, with both arms resting on the table. On the white table, there are two yellow placemats, and on one of them is a white plate with fruits. Not far behind the man, there is a woman wearing a yellow top and blue jeans, barefoot. The background features a white wall and a yellow wooden door, with wooden flooring.
[0-3] The woman walks over to the man and pats him on the shoulder. The man turns his head. The camera then switches to a close-up of the man's face, showing him sucking on the pacifier.
